it.polimi.ingsw.messages.controller

Class ToolCardEMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.messages.Message
      • it.polimi.ingsw.messages.controller.ControllerMessage
        • it.polimi.ingsw.messages.controller.ToolCardEMessage

  • public class ToolCardEMessage
extends ControllerMessage
    Contains the information about the use of a tool card number 7, which in fact doesn't need any parameter.

    Contains everything needed to be transformed into a Json string to be sent across the network as a source of information.
